results.title: A Matter of preference
results.brief_description:
Humorous 2-d animated tale of old Harold and his matter of preference - after all he knows best doesn’t he!
Music - “Sisi” written by Rob Gador performed by Hot Club Swing.

Music by Cheung Wai Hui.

results.title: Rain in the sun
results.brief_description: In some regions of Japan a sunshower is known as a “Kitsune no Yomein” which literally means “Foxes’ Wedding”. This simplistic poetic 2-d animated tale illustrates the legend behind “Kitsune no Yomein”. Introduction in Japanese language with English subtitles.

results.title: The Red dancer
results.brief_description: Dancing red flames multiply and morph into ever-changing shapes, reaching out across the screen to the rhythmic sounds of tribal music beating in the background.

results.title: A Boy and his plant
results.brief_description: Can this kid with a mole right between his eyes be friends with his new plant who definitely has attitude? An amusing computer animated tale.

results.title: Flimflam man
results.brief_description: A catchy animated tale about a flimflam man who turns out to be the man behind the hottest sportswear product ever. Non-narrated with a groovy soundtrack. Music by Markus Kellow.
